com.atc.simulator.display

Class RenderLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atc.simulator.display.RenderLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DisplayRenderableProviderListener, java.lang.Comparable

    public class RenderLayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable, DisplayRenderableProviderListener
    Represents a layer in the display, a collection of items which get rendered together. Either due to draw order, or shader requirements.
